survey_name: Corporate Learning and Development Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate learning and development programs, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to better align with employee needs and organizational goals.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: Which types of learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of the learning content to your job role?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who answered Q1 with options other than 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure mobile-friendly display.
